Dead by Daylight's gameplay revolves around two relatively simple concepts: don't get killed (if you're playing as a survivor), and don't let anyone escape (if you're playing as the killer). At first, I was worried that this 'simplicity' was quickly going to make this game get repetitive and boring, but after 200 hours of playing, I can assure you that that's not the case. During the first hours of gameplay, you'll most likely be relatively lost, and you'll scream whenever you see the killer running after you (trust me, I have many clips of myself just yelling after the pig suddenly charged at me from a random place in the map). This scary phase will, with time, be eventually replaced by an equally exhilarating but arguably more fun phase, in which you begin to gain confidence as a player and, instead of being scared by the killer, you'll start looping and pallet-stunning the killers like crazy. That is where the fun truly begins. I'm pretty much a survivor main, but playing the killer is also lots of fun if you enjoy making people suffer (just don't facecamp pls). There aren't really any cases in which I wouldn't recommend this game to someone, but here are a few things that will make this game even more fun.
1. Play with friends (the survivor team is made up of 4 players, and if you make a party with your friends, you won't only have a better time, but the game will also be a lot easier)
2. Try out playing killer and survivor, both have very different play-styles and if you switch between them, you're less likely to get bored of the game.
3. Try to get a character to prestige III as fast as possible (if you're playing survivor). Then you can just build other characters' perks on that character in order to have 1 character with everything.
4. Don't rush into buying dlc's. This game isn't for everyone, so take it slow and if you begin racking up hours and decide you want to try out playing as a new killer or using some new perks, then purchase them. Plus, the dlc's go on sale pretty much every 2 months.
So yeah, hopefully this helped you out, and I hope that, if you decide to get this game, you'll enjoy it as much as I do!

I love this game. Super fun to play with friends and if you don't have friends then you can choose to just play killer. What ever floats your boat, you do you. The game has come a long way since release and improvements are always being made. If cosmetics are your thing then your in luck as they are always bringing out new cosmetics.
Is the game perfect? No. Every game has bugs and faults which become more noticeable the more you play. The devs work super hard to make the game enjoyable for both sides which is a super hard task on its own as you cant please all the people all the time. They update the game on the reg and the new graphic updates to the map look fantastic.

I hate horror and anything scary. 
Some friends played this game often, I thought it would be scary, boring, simple - but figured I'd try so I could play with them. 
It's actually quite fun and doesn't get old quick.

Плюсы +++
__________________________________

1.Приятная графика.+
2.Довольно не требовательная,оптимизированная игрушка.+
3.Разработчики делают много обновлений добавляют новых персонажей и способности.+
4.Большое разнообразие персонажей как Маньяков так и Выживших.+
5.Богатая механика игры.+

Минусы ---
__________________________________
1.Комьюнити самый главный минус этой игры так как чинишь ген-дyрак, не чинишь тоже дyрак выводы делайте сами.-
2.Если играешь за мана и промахнулся тебя просто будут бээмить.-
3.Нету баланса-
4.Баги не часто их встретишь,но они есть.-
5.Сервера нестабильные пинг 90-150 в каждой катке!-
В общем 10/10 данной игрушке.
